x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Location record is not getting updated correctly when creating a User Assigned to Location record, leaving the Space field empty.
Steps to reproduce: 1.Create a new Location record, and set the following values:
A. Seat Status = Active, B. Usage = Assigned, C. Employee Assignable = true, D. Capacity = 1, E. Workspace Capacity Indicator = true,
2. Find a User who's User record has an empty Homebase and Primary Space,
3. Create a User Assigned to Location record, and set the following values:
A. User = User from Step 2, B. Primary = true, C. **Do not put a value in the Space field, D. Save the record.
Occupancy Status stays Vacant which should be Occupied, Workspace Capacity stays 0 which should be 1. Workspace Occupancy stays 0 which should be 1.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Workspace Occupancy is not updating
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: This issue is seen in Pakistan versions, Update Set is available which solves this issue, Please apply the Update Set which resolves the issue, Update Set name - Pakistan-SFM-9901

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_ce348bfd1b015150ae5b21b5ec4bcb1c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Location record is not getting updated correctly when creating a User Assigned to Location record, leaving the Space field empty.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Create a new Location record, and set the following values:

A. Seat Status = Active, 
B. Usage = Assigned, 
C. Employee Assignable = true, 
D. Capacity = 1, 
E. Workspace Capacity Indicator = true,

2. Find a User who's User record has an empty Homebase and Primary Space,

3. Create a User Assigned to Location record, and set the following values:

A. User = User from Step 2,
B. Primary = true,
C. **Do not put a value in the Space field,
D. Save the record.

 Occupancy Status stays Vacant which should be Occupied, 
 Workspace Capacity stays 0 which should be 1.
 Workspace Occupancy stays 0 which should be 1.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Workspace Occupancy is not updating</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>This issue is seen in Pakistan versions, Update Set is available which solves this issue, Please apply the Update Set which resolves the issue, 
Update Set name - Pakistan-SFM-9901</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
//Checking if connected workplace version is Pakistan
var nuvoloVersionQuery = "name=Connected Workplace^active=true^versionSTARTSWITH17.";
var nuvoloVersion = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
nuvoloVersion.addEncodedQuery(nuvoloVersionQuery);
nuvoloVersion.query();
if (nuvoloVersion.next()) {
	var updSet = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
	updSet.addEncodedQuery('name=Pakistan-SFM-9901');
	updSet.query();
	
	if(!updSet.next()){
		
    util.handleOutput('If workspace occupancy is not updating properly for pakistan version, Please apply Update Set "Pakistan-SFM-9901".', 'warning', 'Space');
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Prasanna.Phadtare@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-02 09:44:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>ce348bfd1b015150ae5b21b5ec4bcb1c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Workspace Occupancy is not updating</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_ce348bfd1b015150ae5b21b5ec4bcb1c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:28</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
